name: Wingin' It (Rubadub Games)
description:
Compete for top of the leaderboard whilst avoiding gnarly hazards and learning from other players' ghosts. 

************************************************************************

Features
  • Venture across farmland, desert and snow in three perilous levels.
  • Compete with other players' times to reach the top of the leaderboards.
  • See other players' online ghosts to learn new routes and avoid common pitfalls.
  • Collect all 15 eggs to unlock new skins, death animations and sounds (that other players may see in their runs).
Controller support
  • Xbox/PC controller
  • Keyboard and mouse
